    • Constructor Detail

      • MP3Player

        public MP3Player(java.lang.String path)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Creates an Instance of MP3Player based on a MP3 File
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the MP3 File as String
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the path does not points to a file we are able to read
        javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException - any other MP3 Encoding based Exception

      • MP3Player

        public MP3Player(java.io.InputStream stream)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                 javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException
        Creates an Instance of MP3Player based on a MP3 Stream.
        May be an Server Stream for VOIP or a Music Streaming or a simple FileInputStream
        Parameters:
        stream - the path to the MP3 File as String
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the path does not points to a file we are able to read
        javazoom.jl.decoder.JavaLayerException - any other MP3 Encoding based Exception

      • getTotalLenght

        public int getTotalLenght()
        Do not call this often!! it is a really unperformed.
        It will create an Temp file with the whole Stream goes to it.
        This operation can take a long time for big streams!!!!
        Except the stream comes from an File. In this case the file will not read completely or duplicated
        Specified by:
        getTotalLenght in class Player
        Returns:
        the total length
        See Also:
        Player.getTotalLenght()

      • getStream

        public java.io.InputStream getStream()
        Description copied from class: Player
        Description : Returns the source of the music.
        Don't read from this stream beacause this will stop the player working
        Specified by:
        getStream in class Player
        Returns:
        the music source as InputStream

        Description copied from class: Player
        Description : Changes the source of the music.
        ONLY USE IF THE PLAYER WASNT USED BEVORE
        We recommend to create a new Player instead
